titles.title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to provide to certain aliens covered shelter or housing on military installations located in the United States.
To prohibit the use of Federal funds to provide to certain aliens covered shelter or housing on military installations located in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits federal funds from being spent on providing shelter or housing to certain non-U.S. nationals (aliens under federal law) on military installations in any state or the District of Columbia. Specifically, this prohibition shall apply to non-U.S. nationals who were not admitted into the United States.
